{{cpp/experimental/shared_future/title|operator{{=}}}}
{{cpp/experimental/concurrency/shared_future/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|1=
std::experimental::shared_future&lt;T&gt;&amp; operator=( const std::experimental::shared_future&lt;T&gt;&amp; other );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|1=
std::experimental::shared_future&lt;T&gt;&amp; operator=( std::experimental::shared_future&lt;T&gt;&amp;&amp; other ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

赋值另一 {{tt|std::experimental::shared_future}} 对象的内容。
@1@ 释放任何共享状态并赋值 {{tt|other}} 的内容给 {{c|*this}}。赋值后，{{c|this-&gt;valid() {{==}} other.valid()}}。
@2@ 释放任何共享状态并移动赋值 {{tt|other}} 的内容给 {{c|*this}}。赋值后，{{c|other.valid() {{==}} false}} 而 {{lc|valid|this-&gt;valid()}} 将生成与 {{c|other.valid()}} 在赋值前相同的值。

===参数===
{{par begin}}
{{par | other |赋值来源的 {{tt|std::experimental::shared_future}} }}
{{par end}}

===返回值===
{{c|*this}}
